body: This problem not happens on branch `release-0_11`. Most probably it has been fixed in the latest branch.

Any update?
I have the same problem on mac osx with ruby example `bundle install`.

``` sh
Using grpc 0.11.0 from https://github.com/grpc/grpc.git (at master)

Gem::Ext::BuildError: ERROR: Failed to build gem native extension.

checking for dlopen() in -ldl... yes
checking for inflate() in -lz... yes

src/core/support/histogram.c:215:17: error: implicit conversion turns floating-point number into integer: 'double' to '_Bool' [-Werror,-Wfloat-conversion]

  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~^~~~~~
include/grpc/support/log.h:98:11: note: expanded from macro 'GPR_ASSERT'

1 error generated.

    --without-opt-lib=${opt-dir}/lib

    --with-grpc-include
    --without-grpc-include=${grpc-dir}/include

    --without-grpc-lib=${grpc-dir}/
    --with-dllib
    --without-dllib
```
